%mdk-data-line={9}
\section{\mdline{9}1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{9}Ｃ语言词法分析规范}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={10}
\subsection{\mdline{10}1.1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{10}语言说明}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={12}
\subsubsection{\mdline{12}1.1.1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{12}保留字}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={13}
\noindent\mdline{13}ANSI C中规定了C语言的保留字有32个，分别是:%mdk
\begin{mdpre}%mdk
\noindent auto~break~case~char~const~continue~defaultdo~double~else~\\
enum~extern~float~forgoto~if~int~long~register~return~\\
short~signed~static~sizeof~struct~switch~typedef~union\\
unsigned~void~volatile~while~auto%mdk
\end{mdpre}
%mdk-data-line={21}
\subsubsection{\mdline{21}1.1.2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{21}标示符}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={23}
\noindent\mdline{23}此处标示符特指\mdline{23}\textbf{用户自定义标示符}\mdline{23}。C语言对标示符有以下规定:%mdk

%mdk-data-line={25}
\begin{enumerate}[noitemsep,topsep=\mdcompacttopsep]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={25}
\item\mdline{25}标识符由字母（A-Z,a-z）、数字（0-9）、下划线“\mdline{25}\_\mdline{25}”组成，首字符不能是数字，但可以是字母或者下划线。%mdk

%mdk-data-line={26}
\item\mdline{26}不能把C语言保留字作为标识符，例如if ,for, while等.%mdk

%mdk-data-line={27}
\item\mdline{27}标识符对大小写敏感%mdk
%mdk
\end{enumerate}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={29}
\subsubsection{\mdline{29}1.1.3.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{29}运算符}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={30}
\noindent\mdline{30}运算符是一种告诉编译器执行特定的数学或逻辑操作的符号。C提供了以下类型的运算符：
\mdline{31}\emph{ 算术运算符: `+ - }\mdline{31} / \%\mdline{31} \mdline{31}++\mdline{31} \mdline{31}\textendash{}\mdline{31}\mdcode{\\
*~关系运算符:~}\mdline{32}==\mdline{32} \mdline{32}!= \mdline{32}\textgreater{}\mdline{32} \mdline{32}\textless{}\mdline{32} \mdline{32}\textgreater{}\mdline{32}= \mdline{32}\textless{}\mdline{32}=\mdline{32}\mdcode{\\
*~逻辑运算符:~}\mdline{33}\&\mdline{33}\&\mdline{33} \textbar{}\textbar{}\mdline{33} \mdline{33}!\mdline{33}\mdcode{\\
*~位运算符:~}\mdline{34}\&\mdline{34} \textbar{} \mdline{34}\textasciicircum{}\mdline{34} \mdline{34}\textasciitilde{}\mdline{34} \mdline{34}\guillemotleft{} \guillemotright{}\mdline{34}\mdcode{\\
*~赋值运算符:~}\mdline{35}=\mdline{35} \mdline{35}+=\mdline{35} \mdline{35}-= \mdline{35}\emph{= \%= \textless{}\textless{}= \&= \textasciicircum{}= !=`
}\mdline{36} 杂项运算符: \mdline{36}\mdcode{\&~*~?:}\mdline{36}
\mdline{37}\emph{此外词法分析器也将}\mdline{37}\emph{界符}\mdline{37}\emph{视为运算符}\mdline{37}:\mdline{37}\mdcode{\{~\}~{}[~]~\textless{}~\textgreater{}~"~'~,~;~}\mdline{37}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={39}
\subsubsection{\mdline{39}1.1.4.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{39}常量}\label{num}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={40}
\noindent\mdline{40}词法分析阶段，常量仅仅分为数字与字符串%mdk

%mdk-data-line={42}
\begin{mddefinitions}%mdk

\mddefterm{\noindent{\bfseries数字：}}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={42}
\begin{mdbmarginx}{}{}{}{1.5em}%mdk
\begin{mddefdata}%mdk
%mdk
\end{mddefdata}%mdk
\end{mdbmarginx}%mdk
%mdk
\end{mddefinitions}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={44}
\begin{enumerate}[noitemsep,topsep=\mdcompacttopsep]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={44}
\item\mdline{44}十进制整数，如：\mdline{44}\mdcode{0,123}\mdline{44}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={45}
\item\mdline{45}十进制浮点数，如： \mdline{45}\mdcode{.1,~0.,~1.234}\mdline{45}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={46}
\item\mdline{46}十进制指数，如： \mdline{46}\mdcode{12E-19,~.33E10}\mdline{46}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={47}
\item\mdline{47}八进制整数， 如：\mdline{47}\mdcode{073~0000012}\mdline{47}
(\mdline{48}\emph{根据C99，不支持八进制浮点及指数，若有均视为十进制}\mdline{48})%mdk

%mdk-data-line={49}
\item\mdline{49}十六进制整数，\mdline{49}\mdcode{0xA,~0x2Ef,}\mdline{49}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={50}
\item\mdline{50}十六进制浮点数，\mdline{50}\mdcode{0x.3p-9,~0xF.p100}\mdline{50}\textbackslash{}\mdline{50}n
 (\mdline{51}\emph{根据C99，十六进制浮点数必须带指数, 且指数符号为p(P)}\mdline{51})%mdk
%mdk
\end{enumerate}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={53}
\begin{mddefinitions}%mdk

\mddefterm{\noindent{\bfseries字符串（及字符）:}}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={53}
\begin{mdbmarginx}{}{}{}{1.5em}%mdk
\begin{mddefdata}%mdk
%mdk
\end{mddefdata}%mdk
\end{mdbmarginx}%mdk
%mdk
\end{mddefinitions}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={55}
\begin{enumerate}[noitemsep,topsep=\mdcompacttopsep]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={55}
\item\mdline{55}转义字符:\mdline{55}\mdcode{\textbackslash{}a~\textbackslash{}b~\textbackslash{}f~\textbackslash{}n~\textbackslash{}r~\textbackslash{}t~\textbackslash{}v~\textbackslash{}\textbackslash{}~\textbackslash{}'~\textbackslash{}?~\textbackslash{}0}\mdline{55}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={56}
\item\mdline{56}字符支持十六进制表示ascii码\mdline{56}\mdcode{\textbackslash{}xhh}\mdline{56}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={57}
\item\mdline{57}字符串中间不允许换行。%mdk
%mdk
\end{enumerate}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={59}
\subsubsection{\mdline{59}1.1.5.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{59}注释符}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={60}
\noindent\mdline{60}注释分为两种%mdk

%mdk-data-line={62}
\begin{enumerate}[noitemsep,topsep=\mdcompacttopsep]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={62}
\item\mdline{62}单行注释：\mdline{62}\mdcode{//}\mdline{62}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={63}
\item\mdline{63}多行注释： \mdline{63}\mdcode{/*....*/}\mdline{63}%mdk
%mdk
\end{enumerate}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={65}
\section{\mdline{65}2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{65}词法分析器实现功能}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={66}
\subsection{\mdline{66}2.1.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{66}实验需求}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={67}
\noindent\mdline{67}设计并实现C语言的词法分析程序%mdk

%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{enumerate}[noitemsep,topsep=\mdcompacttopsep]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={69}
\item\mdline{69}可以识别出用c语言编写的源程序中的每个单词符号，并以记号的形式输出每个单词符号。%mdk

%mdk-data-line={70}
\item\mdline{70}可以识别并跳过源程序中的注释%mdk

%mdk-data-line={71}
\item\mdline{71}可以统计源程序中的语句行数、各类单词的个数、以及字符总数，并输出统计结果%mdk

%mdk-data-line={72}
\item\mdline{72}检查源程序中存在的词法错误，并报告错误所在的位置%mdk

%mdk-data-line={73}
\item\mdline{73}对源程序中出现的错误进行适当的恢复，使词法分析可以继续进行，对源程序进行一次扫描，即可检查并报告源程序中存在的所有词法错误。%mdk
%mdk
\end{enumerate}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={75}
\subsection{\mdline{75}2.2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{75}完成与改进}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={76}
\noindent\mdline{76}完全满足了实验需求，并做出了一些改进：%mdk

%mdk-data-line={78}
\begin{enumerate}[noitemsep,topsep=\mdcompacttopsep]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={78}
\item\mdline{78}除字符串中八进制转义字符形式外，支持C99所有的词法分析。%mdk

%mdk-data-line={79}
\item\mdline{79}可识别保留字，并输出 \mdline{79}\mdcode{\textless{}保留字\textgreater{},\textless{}保留字index\textgreater{}}\mdline{79}.(32个保留字存于const string数组中)%mdk

%mdk-data-line={80}
\item\mdline{80}可识别标示符，存入记号表，并输出: \mdline{80}\mdcode{ID，\textless{}ID表中index\textgreater{}}\mdline{80}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={81}
\item\mdline{81}可识别数字，支持 前文\mdline{81}\mdref{num}{1.1.4}\mdline{81}中所有数字部分。\mdline{81}\textbf{此部分是本词法分析的主要优点之一，投入了作者较多兴趣与精力，所有情况均经过gcc 7.3.0验证}\mdline{81}。识别出的数字存入数字表，输出: \mdline{81}\mdcode{NUM,\textless{}NUM表中index\textgreater{}}\mdline{81}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={82}
\item\mdline{82}可识别字符与字符串，支持转字符的识别，并且字符支持十六进制ascii转义；字符串中换行可报错。存入字符串表，输出：\mdline{82}\mdcode{STR，\textless{}STR表index\textgreater{}}\mdline{82}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={83}
\item\mdline{83}可以识别并跳过源程序中的注释。\mdline{83}\textbf{(此处为了演示效果，将以\mdcode{Coment:\textless{}注释内容\textgreater{}})输出}\mdline{83}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={84}
\item\mdline{84}可以识别运算符界符，直接输出: \mdline{84}\mdcode{\textless{}符号\textgreater{}，\_}\mdline{84}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={85}
\item\mdline{85}可以统计源程序中的语句行数，以及标示符个数，数字个数以及字符串个数。%mdk

%mdk-data-line={86}
\item\mdline{86}检查源程序中存在的词法错误，并报告错误位置,\mdline{86}\textbf{精确到行列}\mdline{86}。输出格式：\mdline{86}\mdcode{\textless{}row\_index\textgreater{},\textless{}column\_index\textgreater{}~ERROR:~\textless{}error原因\textgreater{}:~~~~\textless{}报错字符串\textgreater{}}\mdline{86}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={87}
\item\mdline{87}发现错误后跳过整行，使词法分析器可以继续进行，对源程序进行一次扫描，即可检查并报告源程序中存在的所有错误。%mdk

%mdk-data-line={88}
\item\mdline{88}跳过空格与制表符，此外，对于回车换行符，兼容\mdline{88}\mdcode{Win:~\textbackslash{}r\textbackslash{}n}\mdline{88}，\mdline{88}\mdcode{Mac:~\textbackslash{}r}\mdline{88}，\mdline{88}\mdcode{Linux:~\textbackslash{}n}\mdline{88};%mdk
%mdk
\end{enumerate}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={92}

%mdk-data-line={131}
\subsection{\mdline{131}3.2.\hspace*{0.5em}\mdline{131}状态转移图}\label{section}%mdk%mdk

%mdk-data-line={132}
\noindent\mdline{132}digraph finite\mdline{132}\_\mdline{132}state\mdline{132}\_\mdline{132}machine \{
    rankdir = LR;
    size = \mdline{134}\textquotedblleft{}8,5\textquotedblright{}\mdline{134}
   \mdline{135}\mdbr
\mdline{136}    node\mdline{136} [shape = doublecircle]\mdline{136};

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}do}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}double}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}else}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}enum}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}extern}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}float}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}for}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}goto}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}if}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}int}{\mdcolor{maroon}"},\\

{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}输入区}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
ifstream~t({\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}input.txt}{\mdcolor{maroon}"});\\
string~input(({\mdcolor{navy}std::}istreambuf\_iterator\textless{}{\mdcolor{navy}char}\textgreater{}(t)),~{\mdcolor{navy}std::}istreambuf\_iterator\textless{}{\mdcolor{navy}char}\textgreater{}());\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}标志位}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}long}~{\mdcolor{navy}long}~i\_input~=~-{\mdcolor{purple}1};\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}存放临时字符串}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
string~str~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}读头字符in}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}char}~in~=~input{}[i\_input];\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}行号}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}int}~row~=~{\mdcolor{purple}1},~column~=~{\mdcolor{purple}0};\\
\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}输出区}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
ofstream~o({\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}output.txt}{\mdcolor{maroon}"});\\

{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}符号表}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
vector\textless{}string\textgreater{}~symbol\_talbe;\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}常数表}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\

{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}----------------函数区-------------}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}bool}~goforward()\\
\{\\
\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(++i\_input~\textless{}~input.length())\\
~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~in~=~input{}[i\_input];\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~column++;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.push\_back(in);\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}return}~{\mdcolor{navy}true};\\
~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}return}~{\mdcolor{navy}false};\\
\}\\
\\
{\mdcolor{navy}void}~goback()\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~in~=~input{}[--i\_input];\\
~~~~~~~~str.pop\_back();\\
~~~~~~~~column--;\\
\}\\
\\
{\mdcolor{navy}int}~isreserved()\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}for}~({\mdcolor{navy}int}~i~=~{\mdcolor{purple}0};~i~\textless{}~{\mdcolor{purple}32};~i++)\\
~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(!str.compare(reserves{}[i]))\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}return}~i;\\
~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}return}~-{\mdcolor{purple}1};\\
\}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}enum}~tables\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{teal}ID},\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{teal}NUM},\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{teal}STR}\\
\};\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}返回表内id，若无此变量，则压入}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}void}~intable(tables~t)\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~vector\textless{}string\textgreater{}~*table~=~{\mdcolor{navy}nullptr};\\
~~~~~~~~string~outstr;\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}switch}~(t)\\
~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{teal}ID}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table~=~\&symbol\_talbe;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}ID,~}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{teal}NUM}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table~=~\&num\_talbe;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}NUM,~}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{teal}STR}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table~=~\&string\_table;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}STR,~}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}default}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~cout~\textless{}\textless{}~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}intable~error}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~exit({\mdcolor{purple}0});\\
~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}int}~id;\\
~~~~~~~~vector\textless{}string\textgreater{}::iterator~walker~=~find(table-\textgreater{}begin(),~table-\textgreater{}end(),~str);\\
~~~~~~~~id~=~walker~-~table-\textgreater{}begin();\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(walker~==~table-\textgreater{}end())\\
~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table-\textgreater{}push\_back(str);\\
~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~o~\textless{}\textless{}~outstr~\textless{}\textless{}~id~\textless{}\textless{}~endl;\\
~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
\}\\
{\mdcolor{navy}void}~outtable(tables~t)\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~vector\textless{}string\textgreater{}~*table~=~{\mdcolor{navy}nullptr};\\
~~~~~~~~string~outstr;\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}switch}~(t)\\
~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{teal}ID}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table~=~\&symbol\_talbe;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}ID~TABLE:~}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{teal}NUM}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table~=~\&num\_talbe;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}NUM~TABLE:~}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{teal}STR}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~table~=~\&string\_table;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}STR~TABLE:~}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}default}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outstr~=~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}outtable~error}{\mdcolor{maroon}"};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~exit({\mdcolor{purple}0});\\
~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~o~\textless{}\textless{}~outstr~\textless{}\textless{}table-\textgreater{}size()~\textless{}\textless{}endl;\\
~~~~~~~~vector\textless{}string\textgreater{}::iterator~walker~=~table-\textgreater{}begin();\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}for}~(;~walker~\textless{}~table-\textgreater{}end();~walker++)\\
~~~~~~~~\{~~~~~~~\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~o~\textless{}\textless{}~walker~-~table-\textgreater{}begin()\textless{}\textless{}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}t}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}\textless{}\textless{}~*walker~~\textless{}\textless{}~endl;\\
~~~~~~~~\}\\
\}\\
\\
{\mdcolor{navy}void}~outerror({\mdcolor{navy}const}~{\mdcolor{navy}char}~*error)\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~o~\textless{}\textless{}~row~\textless{}\textless{}~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon},}{\mdcolor{maroon}"}~\textless{}\textless{}~column~-~str.length()+{\mdcolor{purple}1}~\textless{}\textless{}~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}~ERROR~~:}{\mdcolor{maroon}"}~\textless{}\textless{}~error~\textless{}\textless{}~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}:}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}t}{\mdcolor{maroon}"}~\textless{}\textless{}~str\textless{}\textless{}endl;\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}while}~(!(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}r}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}~\textbar{}\textbar{}~in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}n}{\mdcolor{maroon}'})~\&\&~goforward());\\
~~~~~~~~goback();\\
~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
\}\\
\\
{\mdcolor{navy}void}~outopt()\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~o~\textless{}\textless{}~str~\textless{}\textless{}~{\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon},-}{\mdcolor{maroon}"}~\textless{}\textless{}~endl;\\
~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
\}\\
{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}-------------------------------------------}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\
\\
{\mdcolor{navy}int}~main()\\
\{\\
~~~~~~~~input.push\_back({\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}n}{\mdcolor{maroon}'});\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}int}~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}0};~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//默认状态为0}\\
~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}while}~(goforward())\\
~~~~~~~~\{\\
\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}switch}~(state)\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{purple}0}:~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//默认状态}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~((in~\textgreater{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'A'}~\&\&~in~\textless{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'Z'})~\textbar{}\textbar{}~(in~\textgreater{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'a'}~\&\&~in~\textless{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'z'})~\textbar{}\textbar{}~(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\_'}))\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//大小写字母下划线开头}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}1};~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//标示符}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'0'})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//八进制2~十六进制3}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}2};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(in~\textgreater{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'1'}~\&\&~in~\textless{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'9'})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//十进制4}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}11};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//其他特殊符号}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}switch}~(in)\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'.'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}16};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'+'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\&'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\textbar{}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(goforward()~\&\&~!(in~==~str{}[{\mdcolor{purple}0}]~\textbar{}\textbar{}~in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'='}))\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~goback();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outopt();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'-'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(goforward()~\&\&~!(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'-'}~\textbar{}\textbar{}~in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'='}~\textbar{}\textbar{}~in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\textgreater{}'}))\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~goback();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outopt();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'*'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\%'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'='}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'!'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\textasciicircum{}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(goforward()~\&\&~!(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'='}))\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~goback();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outopt();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'/'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(goforward())\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'='})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outopt();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'/'})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}17};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'*'})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}???}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}18};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\textasciitilde{}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'?'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}','}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}';'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'('}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}')'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'{}['}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}']'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\{'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outopt();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'~'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}t}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}r}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(goforward()~\&\&~in~!=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}n}{\mdcolor{maroon}'})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~goback();~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//win系统\textbackslash{}r\textbackslash{}n换行~，mac\textbackslash{}r换行}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~row++;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~column~=~-{\mdcolor{purple}1};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}n}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}:~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//~linux系统~\textbackslash{}n换行}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~row++;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~column~=~-{\mdcolor{purple}1};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}':'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~(goforward()~\&\&~!(in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}':'}))\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~goback();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outopt();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\textgreater{}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\textless{}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}20};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}'}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}22};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.pop\_back();{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//删掉‘}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{maroon}'}{\mdcolor{gray}\textbackslash{}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}'}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}27};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.pop\_back();{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//删掉“}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}default}:\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~outerror({\mdcolor{maroon}"}{\mdcolor{maroon}stray~in~program}{\mdcolor{maroon}"});\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~={\mdcolor{purple}0};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{purple}1}:~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//符号状态}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}if}~((in~\textgreater{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'A'}~\&\&~in~\textless{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'Z'})~\textbar{}\textbar{}~(in~\textgreater{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'a'}~\&\&~in~\textless{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'z'})~\textbar{}\textbar{}~(in~\textgreater{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'0'}~\&\&~in~\textless{}=~{\mdcolor{maroon}'9'})~\textbar{}\textbar{}~in~==~{\mdcolor{maroon}'\_'})\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}1};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~goback();\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}int}~flag~=~isreserved();\\

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~o~\textless{}\textless{}~str~\textless{}\textless{}~{\mdcolor{maroon}','}~\textless{}\textless{}~flag~\textless{}\textless{}~endl;\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~str.clear();\\

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}else}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~intable({\mdcolor{teal}ID});\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}0};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}break};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{navy}case}~{\mdcolor{purple}2}:~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//0~~八进制~or~十六进制}\\

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}3};~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}//十六进制~十六进制浮点数必须带指数p~(g++)}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\{\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}12};\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\}\\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mdcolor{darkgreen}/*}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}此外，只要加'.'~无论后面是否跟数字or指数都视为浮点数。如0xA.~报错：十六进制浮点数必须带指数}{\mdcolor{darkgreen}*/}\\

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~state~=~{\mdcolor{purple}0};\\
